description: Former President Donald Trump announced that he will visit Springfield, Ohio, and Aurora, Colorado, in the not-too-distant future. “I’m going to Springfield, and I’m going to Aurora,” Trump said during a political rally on Wednesday.  The two cities have become focal points of the 2024 presidential election because of the national conversation surrounding illegal immigration. title: Trump announces he will visit Springfield, Ohio, and Aurora, Colorado

description: Former President Donald Trump lamented on Fox News’s Gutfeld that he didn’t “go after” ABC News moderators David Muir and Linsey Davis during his debate with Vice President Kamala Harris. Trump said he wanted to be “elegant,” so refrained from doing so. “I think my only regret is that I wanted to be elegant, and […]
title: Trump says ‘only regret’ from debate with Harris is he didn’t ‘go after’ moderators

description: Israeli intelligence services have delivered a devastating and highly impressive blow against Hezbollah, the Iranian terrorist proxy based in southern Lebanon. On Tuesday, Israeli security forces detonated small numbers of explosives they had planted inside Hezbollah pagers when they were being made in Western Europe months ago. The terrorists use this old technology to make […]
title: Exploding pagers might give China an idea

description: Vice President Kamala Harris, who grew up in California and Quebec, has been mocked for her various adaptations of regional accents while on the presidential campaign trail. title: Harris tries a new ‘Latina’ accent amid criticisms

description: Rep. Byron Donalds (R-FL) has called for President Joe Biden to take action to prevent a strike along the East Coast that poses a major financial impact should the strike go through. title: Byron Donalds demands Biden prevent East Coast port strike: ‘Where is he?’

description: The University of Maryland’s Students for Justice in Palestine chapter is suing the university after it limited the organization’s planned Oct. 7 events. title: University of Maryland’s Students for Justice in Palestine sues school over Oct. 7 event limitations

description: Sen. title: Senate Intel chairman warns of foreign interference in days after election

description: For the second time in about three months, Republican and Democratic senators sparred over a set of in vitro fertilization bills in the nation’s capital.  Republicans blocked Sen. Tammy Duckworth’s (D-IL) Right to IVF Act on the same day Democrats blocked a GOP bill titled the IVF Protection Act.  Both bills claim to protect access […]
title: What’s the difference between the IVF bills Senate Democrats and Republicans keep fighting about?
